database.name: VIEW SSPR_UTILITYEMPLOYEE_V
database.view: SELECT cbp.name AS empleado, to_char('') AS value, to_char('') AS periodo, to_char('utilidades') AS concepto, c.taxid AS taxid_org, b.name AS org, n.year, n.c_year_id, cbp.c_bpartner_id, cbp.taxid AS taxid_employee, to_char(CASE WHEN cbp.em_sspr_documenttype = 'NI' THEN 'C' WHEN cbp.em_sspr_documenttype = 'P' THEN 'P' WHEN cbp.em_sspr_documenttype = 'SRT' THEN 'E' ELSE NULL END) AS tipoidentificacion, cbp.em_sspr_documentno AS numeroidentificacion, cbp.em_sspr_lastname AS empleadoapellido, cbp.em_sspr_firstname AS empleadonombre, o.value AS codigoestab, to_char(CASE WHEN m.countrycode = 'EC' THEN '01' ELSE '02' END) AS pais, m.em_sspr_coderesidence AS codigopais, to_char(CASE WHEN m.em_sspr_applyagreement = 'Y' THEN 'SI' ELSE 'NO' END) AS aplicaconvenio, to_char(CASE WHEN cbp.em_sspr_isdisabled = 'Y' THEN 'SI' ELSE 'NO' END) AS discapacitado, cbp.em_sspr_disability AS porcentajediscapacidad, to_char(COALESCE(CASE WHEN cbp.em_sspr_representsdisabled = 'Y' THEN CASE WHEN p.em_sspr_documenttype = 'NI' THEN 'C' WHEN p.em_sspr_documenttype = 'P' THEN 'P' WHEN p.em_sspr_documenttype = 'SRT' THEN 'E' ELSE NULL END ELSE NULL END, 'N')) AS tipoidentdiscapacidad, to_char(COALESCE(CASE WHEN cbp.em_sspr_representsdisabled = 'Y' THEN p.taxid ELSE NULL END, '999')) AS numeroidentifdiscapacidad, ud.utility_employee + ud.utility_loads AS utilidades, z.taxid AS ruccontador FROM sspr_utility_detail ud LEFT JOIN c_bpartner cbp ON cbp.c_bpartner_id = ud.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN c_year n ON ud.c_year_id = n.c_year_id LEFT JOIN ad_org b ON ud.ad_org_id = b.ad_org_id LEFT JOIN ad_orginfo c ON b.ad_org_id = c.ad_org_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner f ON c.c_bpartner_id = f.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner_location k ON cbp.c_bpartner_id = k.c_bpartner_id AND k.isactive = 'Y' LEFT JOIN c_location l ON k.c_location_id = l.c_location_id LEFT JOIN c_country m ON l.c_country_id = m.c_country_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner p ON cbp.em_sspr_bpartner_disabled_id = p.c_bpartner_id LEFT JOIN sspr_establishmentcode o ON cbp.em_sspr_establishmentcode_id = o.sspr_establishmentcode_id LEFT JOIN ad_clientinfo y ON b.ad_client_id = y.ad_client_id LEFT JOIN c_bpartner z ON y.em_sspr_c_bpartner_id = z.c_bpartner_id WHERE cbp.isemployee = 'Y' AND (ud.utility_employee + ud.utility_loads) <> 0 AND (((SELECT count(*) AS max FROM c_bpartner_location y_1 WHERE y_1.c_bpartner_id = cbp.c_bpartner_id)) = 0 OR k.created = ((SELECT max(y_1.created) AS max FROM c_bpartner_location y_1 WHERE y_1.c_bpartner_id = cbp.c_bpartner_id))) ORDER BY cbp.name
